typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		EmpName as string,
		DepartmentID as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Employeedetails
source(output(
		DepartmentID as string,
		DepartName as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Emplyeedepartment
Employeedetails, Emplyeedepartment join(Employeedetails@DepartmentID == Emplyeedepartment@DepartmentID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		EmpName,
		Country,
		DepartName
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Selectedcolumn
Selectedcolumn split(equals(DepartName, "HR"),
	equals(DepartName, "IT"),
	disjoint: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> HRdata@(HRdataonly, ITData)
